On this page
  1. Mar 2025

    Promoted to Senior Product Manager

    Finally made my first career big splash.

  2. Mar 2025

    Got married

    Mrs said yes to a lifetime together. Strictly no take backsies!

  3. May 2024

    Completed executive education in Product Strategy

    Obtained from Northwestern Kellogg School of Management.

    Verify
  4. Sep 2022

    Second ADPList Super Mentor award

    I guess people find my thoughts and opinion rather insightful.

  5. Jun 2022

    Completed Workato's Automation Pro III

    Became an expert in my own product, as it should be.

    Verify
  6. Mar 2022

    First ADPList Super Mentor award

    Gained recognition for spending a lot of time talking.

  7. Dec 2021

    Joined ADPList as a mentor

    Helped aspiring product managers/techies get their first gig in the biz.

  8. Mar 2021

    Became a Certified Usability Analyst

    HFI taught me the basics of good human-computer interaction.

    Verify
  9. Jan 2021

    Became an Advanced Certified Scrum Product Owner

    Basically, I got Scrum ingrained in my brain even more.

    Verify
  10. Apr 2020

    Published 4 Figma Plugins

    One of which runs a basic Snake game in Figma.

  11. Jul 2017

    Presented at IEEE AIM Conference

    Flew to Germany to speak about impulse shaper and drink weißbier.

    View publication
  12. Jun 2017

    Conducted a robot design workshop

    Got people to assemble my pseudo-Lego kit at the Art Science Museum.

  13. Sep 2016

    Received the IES Gold Medal award

    Somehow graduated top of my batch again, this time in university.

  14. Mar 2016

    Became a Certified SOLIDWORKS Professional

    Passed the more rigorous exam measuring my CAD proficiency.

    Verify
  15. Oct 2015

    Exhibited at Maker Faire European Edition 2015

    Flew to Italy to showcase our amphibious rolling robot.

  16. Jun 2014

    Received the Di Yerbury International Scholar award

    Plus pocket money to spend during my exchange at MIT.

  17. Jul 2013

    Received the Tay Chen Hui Memorial award

    Somehow graduated as top science student from my high school.

  18. May 2013

    Received the ASEAN Undergraduate Scholarship

    Secured free tertiary education.

  19. Nov 2008

    Received the MOE School-Based Scholarship

    And migrated to Singapore in search of a better future.
